@rossi_davide @CamilaStampa Any idea what the justification for letting them in was?  I'm trying to find out why a whole theater group apparently got in sometime in January for 'Singin in the Rain' performances in Tokyo and Osaka.  As far as I can tell, Japanese language news media ignored this.

In honor of @RememberThisPod I have been rewatching some of my favorite 1940s/50s movies with a new eye. Gene Kelly in Singin’ In The Rain remains a top favorite, but now when I watch it, I think about how insufferable he was to Debbie Reynolds at the time.

@jland1025 @tcm The multiplicity of choices might be overwhelming, ending up curled in a fetal position and sobbing, "Do I do all Stanwyck? An evening of Mitchell Leisen? All pre-Code? Have to have Singin' in the Rain! Fred and Ginger? Non-Thin Man Powell and Loy?" Aaaagh!
